headline: Democrats Ripping Off Covid Masks Before Midterms
author: DrewBerquist.com
sentences:
Phil Murphy, a Democrat who barely eked out a win in the reliably blue Garden State in November, was the first to lift his school mask mandate this week after the new CDC guidance, and Democratic governors in California, Delaware, Oregon, Connecticut and New York quickly followed course.”
Democrats are lifting mask mandates and lockdown restrictions ONLY because they are worried about the midterm elections.

“The mask requirement in K-12 public & private schools and child care facilities expires at 11:59pm on Thursday, March 31.”
“It’s about time to end the statewide school mask mandate and enable each local boards of education to decide what is best for their schools,” Connecticut Governor Ted Lamont, who is up for reelection, tweeted Wednesday.

“At this time, we say that it’s the right decision to lift this mandate for indoor businesses and let counties, cities and businesses to make their own decisions on what they want to do with respect to mask or vaccination requirement,” New York Governor Kathy Hochul, who is running to stay in the governor’s seat, said Wednesday.

With the notable exception of the White House, Democrats at every level are signaling their support for returning to normal as polls show Americans are weary of coronavirus restrictions, which Republican states have largely done away with.

Let’s be clear: the data on masking and vaccines didn’t change, the polling for Democrats did.https://t.co/77x66MqR9X
— Congresswoman Debbie Lesko (@RepDLesko) February 9, 2022
Yup, Democrat governors are running for political cover.
“Local municipalities, as you know, I think ought to be free to do with what they want.” Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has been trashed by Democrats for saying the same thing for the past two years.
According to a recent poll by Monmouth University, 70% of Americans say it’s time for the country to move on from the pandemic, and a decreasing number of Americans support COVID-related mandates.
President Biden’s approval ratings on handling COVID, once a strength, are also now underwater, with 43% approving and 53% disapproving, according to the poll.
“Our statewide indoor mask requirement will expire on 2/15,” said COVID hysteric California Governor Gavin Newsom, up for reelection this fall, tweeted Monday.
“We are lifting DE’s statewide mask mandate for indoor public settings at 8am on Friday, Feb 11,” Delaware Governor John Carney tweeted Monday.
FNC: “Democrats across the country are scrambling to reverse course on COVID-19 restrictions as this year’s midterm elections loom.
The opinions expressed by contributors and/or content partners are their own and do not necessarily reflect the views of LifeZette.
Which, given their sudden calculations, shows the entire process was politically motivated in the first place.
Pennsylvania Democrat Governor Tom Wolf, a rabid COVID scammer, has changed his tune.
It’s absolutely fun to watch them twist and turn in the wind before the midterms.
It originally appeared in DrewBerquist.com and is used by permission.
This piece was written by David Kamioner on February 10, 2022.
They are reading the polls and acting accordingly.
Democrats are running for the hills on COVID-19.
Here they are switching skins.
Nice to watch them retreat.
New Jersey Gov.
